short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension disable/enable proxy with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you enable/disable proxy frequently? If yes, this is the extension for you. This extension helps you to enable/disable browser proxy with one click. This extension assumes that your browser proxy is set to system wide proxy (your organizational proxy). If you want to disable proxy when connected to Home Wifi network and enable it when you are back to office with just one click, this extension help's you to do that.
